welcome.title: 👋 Thanks for adding me!
welcome.description:
Hello! I'm your new moderation bot.

**Main commands:**
• `/help` - See all commands
• `/setupmute` - Configure moderation
• `/setlogs` - Configure logs

To get started, use `/help`!

*Servers: {serverCount}*

ban.description: Ban a member from the server
ban.error_hierarchy: You cannot ban {user} (higher or equal role)
ban.error_bot_permissions: I don't have the necessary permissions to ban this member

kick.description: Kick a member from the server
kick.error_hierarchy: You cannot kick this member (higher or equal role)
kick.error_not_found: This user is not a member of this server.
kick.error_not_kickable: I cannot kick {user}. They may have higher permissions than me.

mute.error_no_setup: The mute system is not configured. Use `/setupmute` first
mute.error_role_not_found: The mute role cannot be found. Reconfigure with `/setupmute`
mute.error_invalid_duration: Invalid duration. Use a format like `10m`, `1h`, `1d` (max 28 days)

unmute.error_no_setup: The mute system is not configured
unmute.error_role_not_found: The mute role cannot be found

clear.error: An error occurred while deleting messages
clear.no_messages_found: No messages found for {user} in the last 100 messages.

setlang.error: ❌ An error occurred while changing the language.

setlogs.no_permission: ❌ You don't have permission to manage the server.
setlogs.error: ❌ An error occurred while configuring logs.

lock.no_permission: ❌ You don't have permission to manage channels.
lock.error: ❌ An error occurred while locking the channel.

unlock.no_permission: ❌ You don't have permission to manage channels.
unlock.error: ❌ An error occurred while unlocking the channel.

unban.description: Unban a user from the server
unban.error_not_banned: This user is not banned from the server
unban.no_permission: ❌ You don't have permission to unban members.

setupmute.no_permission: ❌ You don't have permission to manage roles.

help.main_description:
Here is the list of all available commands. Select a category from the dropdown menu below to see details.

**Available categories:**
🛡️ **Moderation** - Server management commands
🌍 **Public** - Commands accessible to everyone
⭐ **Premium** - Exclusive premium commands
help.default_instructions:
**💡 Instructions:**
• Use the dropdown menu below to choose a category
• Each category contains specific commands
• All commands are available according to your permissions
help.footer_text: Need help? Contact the staff or use the appropriate commands!
help.moderation_description:
**Available moderation commands:**

`/ban` - Ban a member from the server
`/kick` - Kick a member from the server
`/mute` - Mute a member
`/unmute` - Unmute a member
`/warn` - Warn a member
`/clear` - Delete messages
`/setupmute` - Configure the mute system
help.public_description:
**Available public commands:**

`/help` - Display this help
`/ping` - Check bot latency
`/serverinfo` - Server information
help.premium_description:
**Available premium commands:**

`/ask` - Ask a question to the AI

*These commands require a premium subscription.*

ask.error: ❌ This command requires a Premium subscription.

ask.title: 🤖 AI Response
ask.question: Question
ask.premium_required: This command requires a premium subscription.

ask.title: 🤖 AI Assistant
ask.premium_required:
This command requires a premium server. ⭐
Contact the support team for more information.
ask.error: Sorry, I couldn't process your question.

errors.no_permission: ❌ You don't have permission to use this command.
errors.premium_required: ❌ This feature requires a Premium subscription.
errors.command_execution: An error occurred while executing this command.

cooldown.title: ⏰ Cooldown
cooldown.message: You must wait {timeLeft} seconds before using this command again.
